"Xiera": "Suppressed the enemy forces! Let's use this time to summon a Buster Pile and destroy the Devil Barriers!"

"When the Defense Phase ends,
it transitions over to the Buster Phase.

During the Buster Phase, the object is to
destroy all of the Devil Barriers protecting the
Devil Castle."

"Buster Piles can destroy the devil barriers
created from the Devil Castle.

They are automatically summoned during the
Buster Phase and head towards the Devil Castle.

When all of the Buster Piles that are summoned
hit and destroy the Devil Barriers, or if they're destroyed,
the Buster Phase ends."
"Detecting enemy readings surrounding us! Protect the Buster Pile from being broken!"
